product_name: Aqua-Bound Sting Ray Hybrid Posi-Lok Kayak Paddle - Small Shaft
long_description: Made for small hands, the small-shaft Aqua-Bound Sting Ray Hybrid Posi-Lok carbon-shaft kayak paddle is suited to exploring your local waters via a low-angle paddling style.
short_description: Made for small hands, the small-shaft Aqua-Bound Sting Ray Hybrid Posi-Lok carbon-shaft kayak paddle is suited to exploring your local waters via a low-angle paddling style.
